startDate.description: The start date of the data collection period in date format.

endDate.description: The end date of the data collection period in date format.

asin.description: The unique identifier for the ASIN (Amazon Standard Identification Number).

orders.description: The total number of orders placed during the specified time period.

uniqueCustomers.description: The total number of unique customers who made purchases during the specified time period.

repeatCustomersPctTotal.description: The percentage of repeat customers out of the total customers.

repeatPurchaseRevenue.description: The revenue generated from repeat purchases.

amount.description: The amount of repeat purchase revenue.

currencyCode.description: The currency code (e.g., USD) for the repeat purchase revenue amount.

repeatPurchaseRevenuePctTotal.description: The percentage of repeat purchase revenue out of the total revenue.

dataEndTime.description: The end time of the data collection period in date format.

queryEndDate.description: The end date of the query period for data analysis in date format.
